sources.title: Check And Double Check 1930 [colorised, 4k, 60FPS]
sources.description: Check and Double check 1930 is a  black and white movie film which has been colorised, upscaled to 4K, and frames per second boosted to 60 FPS in 2021 using Artificial Intelligence (A.I) and Google Colab @  https://colab.research.google.com/   Technologies used: A.I. Colorizing:  https://github.com/jantic/DeOldify  A.I. Increasing frame rate 60 FPS:  https://rife-vfi.github.io   A.I. Upscaling to 4K:  https://ffmpeg.org   GPU: Google Colab.

metadata.Plot: Typical Amos 'n Andy storyline has the boys trying to make a go of their "open-air" taxi business while they get caught up in a society hassle, involving driving musicians to a fancy party. All the regular characters are here (or mentioned), including the famous Mystic Knights of the Sea. The only film appearance of radio's long-running characters.
metadata.Actors: Freeman F. Gosden, Charles J. Correll, Sue Carol
